ai-patthana21.52:0.2_0: under the investigation of principles, sometimes the top of the Dhamma is given to him:
ai-patthana21.52:1.1_0: Not objects, resistances, and not gives rise to the repetitions, consciousness arises dependent on the repulsion.
ai-patthana21.52:2.1_0: Not objects, resistances, and doesn’t give rise to the repulsion of the teaching. Another is a condition for the sake of repulsion.
ai-patthana21.52:2.1_1: ‘... for the sake of conditioned things.’ ...
ai-patthana21.52:2.1_2: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
ai-patthana21.52:3.1_0: There are three unworthy for the sake of non-violence ...
ai-patthana21.52:4.1_0: Not seeing the Dhamma, resentment doesn’t give rise to repulsion, dependently originated, and a cause for this reason.
ai-patthana21.52:4.1_1: ‘This is the reason why foundation of one kind’ ...
ai-patthana21.52:6.1_1: This is the section in brief.
ai-patthana21.52:7.1_0: ‘... for the sake of three fetters.’ ...
ai-patthana21.52:8.1_0: Not consciousness arises in someone who doesn’t give rise to repulsion, only with no cause or condition.
ai-patthana21.52:8.1_1: This is the section in brief.
ai-patthana21.52:9.1_0: ‘... for the sake of three fetters.’ ...
ai-patthana21.52:10.1_0: They don’t give rise to the thought of associated with mind. They’re not dedicated to the higher mind. This is a cause of repulsion by the mind.
ai-patthana21.52:10.1_1: This is the section in brief.
ai-patthana21.52:11.1_0: ‘... for the sake of three fetters.’ ...
ai-patthana21.52:12.1_0: mind is not only for the sake of consciousness, nor for the sake of repulsion, views, doubt, conceit, the desire to be reborn, and ignorance.
ai-patthana21.52:12.1_1: This is the section in brief.
ai-patthana21.52:13.1_0: ‘... for the sake of three fetters.’ ...
ai-patthana21.52:14.1_0: Not for the consciousness-originated, not for the consciousness-originated, dependently originated the mind, and for the sake of consciousness.
ai-patthana21.52:14.1_1: So it is of three consciousnesses that originate with mind.
ai-patthana21.52:14.1_2: This is the section in brief.
ai-patthana21.52:15.1_0: ‘... for the sake of three fetters.’ ...
ai-patthana21.52:16.1_1: This is the section in brief.
ai-patthana21.52:17.1_0: ‘... for the sake of three fetters.’ ...
ai-patthana21.52:18.1_0: Not repeatedly practiced, he doesn’t give rise to the teachings, nor do he longed for them.
ai-patthana21.52:18.1_1: This is the section in brief.
ai-patthana21.52:19.1_0: ‘... for the sake of three fetters.’ ...
ai-patthana21.52:20.1_0: mind doesn’t give rise to the eighteen mental preoccupations. Their mind doesn’t give rise to the thought, not for the sake of consciousness.
ai-patthana21.52:20.1_1: This is the section in brief.
ai-patthana21.52:21.1_0: ‘... for the sake of three fetters.’ ...
ai-patthana21.52:22.1_0: mind doesn’t give rise to the eighteen mental preoccupations. Their mind doesn’t give rise to the thought, not for the sake of the paths, and for the sake of being conditioned by habit.
ai-patthana21.52:22.1_1: This is the section in brief.
ai-patthana21.52:23.1_0: ‘... for the sake of three fetters.’ ...
ai-patthana21.52:24.1_1: This is the section in brief.
ai-patthana21.52:25.1_0: ‘... for the sake of three fetters.’ ...
ai-patthana21.52:27.1_0: Not for the sake of harming the exterior and exterior thoughts, dependently originated preoccupied with the outside.
ai-patthana21.52:27.1_1: This is the section in brief.
ai-patthana21.52:28.1_0: ‘... for the sake of three fetters.’ ...
ai-patthana21.52:29.1_0: Not for the sake of grasping, not for the sake of grasping.
ai-patthana21.52:29.1_1: This is the section in brief.
ai-patthana21.52:31.1_0: Not for the sake of grasping, not for the sake of grasping, and for the sake of function, and for the sake of repulsion.
ai-patthana21.52:31.1_1: This is the section in brief.
ai-patthana21.52:32.1_0: ‘... for the sake of three fetters.’ ...
